text: En navir ghuriba, gavgaviba puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Moses Osirizir Araziba, en arazir kurabar gɨn amangamin gavgaviba puvatɨ. Ezɨ Moses Osirizir Araziba damuan koghamin bizir kam, God uabɨ a gami. God uan Otarim amadazɨ, a gumazimɨn mɨn otogha, egha arazir kurabagh amir gumazimɨn mɨn gari. A en arazir kuraba agɨvasa ize, ezɨ an ingangarimɨn tuavimɨn, God gumazamiziba itir arazir kurabar gavgavim agɨvagha a gasɨghasɨki.
